verses.verse: And Adam <S%H120><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> <S%H853><s%> Havah <S%H2332><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%>; and she conceived <S%H2029><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8799><s%> <S%H853><s%> Kayin <S%H7014><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I have gotten <S%H7069><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> from <S%H854><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And she again <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8800><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> Hevel <S%H1893><s%>. And Hevel <S%H1893><s%> was a keeper <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of sheep <S%H6629><s%>, but Kayin <S%H7014><s%> was a tiller <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%>.

And in process <S%H7093><s%> of time <S%H3117><s%> it came to pass, that Kayin <S%H7014><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> of the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%> an offering <S%H4503><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And Hevel <S%H1893><s%>, he <S%H1931><s%> also brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> of the firstlings <S%H1062><s%> of his flock <S%H6629><s%> and of the fat <S%H2459><s%> thereof. And the YY <S%H3068><s%> had respect <S%H8159><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Hevel <S%H1893><s%> and to his offering <S%H4503><s%>:

But unto Kayin <S%H7014><s%> and to his offering <S%H4503><s%> he had not respect <S%H8159><s%> <S%H8804><s%>. And Kayin <S%H7014><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> wroth <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and his countenance <S%H6440><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Kayin <S%H7014><s%>, Why art thou wroth <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8804><s%>? and why is thy countenance <S%H6440><s%> fallen <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8804><s%> ?

If <S%H518><s%> thou doest well <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, shalt thou not be accepted <S%H7613><s%>? and if thou doest not well <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, sin <S%H2403><s%> lieth <S%H7257><s%> <S%H8802><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%>. And unto thee shall be his desire <S%H8669><s%>, and thou shalt rule <S%H4910><s%> <S%H8799><s%> over him.

And Kayin <S%H7014><s%> talked <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with <S%H413><s%> Hevel <S%H1893><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%>: and it came to pass, when they were in the field <S%H7704><s%>, that Kayin <S%H7014><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against <S%H413><s%> Hevel <S%H1893><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%>, and slew him <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Kayin <S%H7014><s%>, Where <S%H335><s%> is Hevel <S%H1893><s%> thy brother <S%H251><s%>? And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not: Am I my brother's <S%H251><s%> keeper <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8802><s%> ?

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, What <S%H4100><s%> hast thou done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>? the voice <S%H6963><s%> of thy brother's <S%H251><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> crieth <S%H6817><s%> <S%H8802><s%> unto me from the ground <S%H127><s%>.

And now art thou cursed <S%H779><s%> <S%H8803><s%> from the earth <S%H127><s%>, which hath opened <S%H6475><s%> <S%H8804><s%> her mouth <S%H6310><s%> to receive <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8800><s%> thy brother's <S%H251><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> from thy hand <S%H3027><s%>;

When <S%H3588><s%> thou tillest <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the ground <S%H127><s%>, it shall not henceforth <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> yield <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto thee her strength <S%H3581><s%>; a fugitive <S%H5128><s%> <S%H8801><s%> and a vagabond <S%H5110><s%> <S%H8802><s%> shalt thou be in the earth <S%H776><s%>.
And Kayin <S%H7014><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, My punishment <S%H5771><s%> is greater <S%H1419><s%> than I can bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.

Behold, thou hast driven me out <S%H1644><s%> <S%H8765><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> from the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%>; and from <S%H5921><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> shall I be hid <S%H5641><s%> <S%H8735><s%>; and I shall be a fugitive <S%H5128><s%> <S%H8801><s%> and a vagabond <S%H5110><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%>; and it shall come to pass <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, that every one that findeth me <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8802><s%> shall slay me <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Therefore <S%H3651><s%> whosoever slayeth <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8802><s%> Kayin <S%H7014><s%>, vengeance shall be taken <S%H5358><s%> <S%H8714><s%> on him sevenfold <S%H7659><s%>. And the YY <S%H3068><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a mark <S%H226><s%> upon Kayin <S%H7014><s%>, lest <S%H1115><s%> any finding <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8802><s%> him should kill <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8687><s%> him.

And Kayin <S%H7014><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Nod <S%H5113><s%>, on the east <S%H6926><s%> of Eden <S%H5731><s%>.

And Kayin <S%H7014><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%>; and she conceived <S%H2029><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Hanokh <S%H2585><s%>: and he builded <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8802><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%>, and called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, after the name <S%H8034><s%> of his son <S%H1121><s%>, Hanokh <S%H2585><s%>.

And unto Hanokh <S%H2585><s%> was born <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8735><s%> Irad <S%H5897><s%>: and Irad <S%H5897><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Mehujael <S%H4232><s%>: and Mehujael <S%H4232><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Methusael <S%H4967><s%>: and Methusael <S%H4967><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Lamech <S%H3929><s%>.

And Lamech <S%H3929><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him two <S%H8147><s%> wives <S%H802><s%>: the name <S%H8034><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> was Adah <S%H5711><s%>, and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the other <S%H8145><s%> Zillah <S%H6741><s%>.

And Adah <S%H5711><s%> bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Jabal <S%H2989><s%>: he was the father <S%H1><s%> of such as dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in tents <S%H168><s%>, and of such as have cattle <S%H4735><s%>.

And his brother's <S%H251><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> was Jubal <S%H3106><s%>: he was the father <S%H1><s%> of all such as handle <S%H8610><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the harp <S%H3658><s%> and organ <S%H5748><s%>.

And Zillah <S%H6741><s%>, she also bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Tubalcain <S%H8423><s%>, an instructer <S%H3913><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of every artificer <S%H2794><s%> in brass <S%H5178><s%> and iron <S%H1270><s%>: and the sister <S%H269><s%> of Tubalcain <S%H8423><s%> was Naamah <S%H5279><s%>.

And Lamech <S%H3929><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto his wives <S%H802><s%>, Adah <S%H5711><s%> and Zillah <S%H6741><s%>, Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%>; ye wives <S%H802><s%> of Lamech <S%H3929><s%>, hearken <S%H238><s%> <S%H8685><s%> unto my speech <S%H565><s%>: for I have slain <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> to my wounding <S%H6482><s%>, and a young man <S%H3206><s%> to my hurt <S%H2250><s%>.
If <S%H3588><s%> Kayin <S%H7014><s%> shall be avenged <S%H5358><s%> <S%H8714><s%> sevenfold <S%H7659><s%>, truly Lamech <S%H3929><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> and sevenfold <S%H7651><s%>.

And Adam <S%H120><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%> again <S%H5750><s%>; and she bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%>, and called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> SHet <S%H8352><s%>: For 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, said she, hath appointed <S%H7896><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me another <S%H312><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> instead <S%H8478><s%> of Hevel <S%H1893><s%>, whom <S%H3588><s%> Kayin <S%H7014><s%> slew <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

And to SHet <S%H8352><s%>, to him <S%H1931><s%> also there was born <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8795><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%>; and he called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Enos <S%H583><s%>: then began men <S%H2490><s%> <S%H8717><s%> to call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8800><s%> upon the name <S%H8034><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.
